      • isIdle

        public boolean isIdle(int time)
        Checks if the server has been idle for more than the transmitted time
        Parameters:
        time - - threshold time
        Returns:
        true if server has been idle for more than the parameter, false otherwise

        Returns:

      • moveClients

        public void moveClients(int number,
               Server s)
        Moves last Clients from transmitted Server to caller Server
        Parameters:
        number - = number of clients to be moved
        s - Server with too many clients
